title: Understanding the Question
text: The question asks for a method used to find patterns and relationships in large datasets. Think about techniques or tools that involve analyzing data to uncover hidden patterns.

title: Focus on Machine Learning
text: Machine Learning is a method that uses algorithms to analyze data, learn from it, and make predictions or decisions. It is often used to find patterns in large datasets.

title: Descriptive Statistics
text: Descriptive statistics are measures such as mean, median, and standard deviation that are calculated at the beginning of analyzing data.

title: Visualizing
text: Visualizations often help find patterns, but can get cluttered with too much data.
